scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.patch-release: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.preminor-release: npm run build && npm version preminor && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.prerelease: npm run build && npm version prerelease && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
